long_desc.thetext:
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0 Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; rv:2.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0
yahoo pops up and slows my search, google or bing will be running and yahoo will pop up and go in another search or I'll be in googles bing will jump in, but it's yahoo that is pi-sing me off, I've tried to remove it, it off the toolbar and still pop's up. can you help me get this fixed. thank you
Reproducible: Always

Do you have some kind of Yahoo! toolbar installed? (Use Add/Remove Programs in the Windows Control Panel and check if you have something with Yahoo in the name.)
Which Firefox extensions do you have? (Copy the contents from Extensions at about:support and post it here.)
If you make a new profile and then search Google or Bing, do you still have problems with Yahoo pop-ups then? https://support.mozilla.com/en-US/kb/Basic%20Troubleshooting#w_8-make-a-new-profile
